#### 1. Introduction
Protein Tau:
-Observed to be key in several neuronal functions. 
-Its destabilization has been associated with neuronal dysfunction and death. 
-Aggregation associated with Alzheimer's disease and other neurodegenerative disorders. 

Experiment design: RNA sequencing of SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cell line. Two groups: Tau overexpressing, control. Three samples (replicates) per group. 

Objective: analyse the effect of the protein Tau on the neural transcriptome and on gene expression. 

#### 1.2 Data descriptiom

Data
The data consists of three sheets:
-Reads
-RPM (Reads per million)
-RPKM (Reads per Kilobase per Million)

Each sheet has six values:
-Three control repeats
-Three Tau overexpressing repeats

There are two additional columns: 
-Gene name
-Experiment ID
